item.description:
>>>>Regent Theatre's Page for this movie<<<<

Award-winning filmmaker Phil Grabsky and Seventh Art Productions, the makers of 2007's arthouse hit In Search of Mozart, are back in theaters with a new feature-length biographical film about the life of Ludwig van Beethoven, In Search of Beethoven.



After playing Beethoven's 9th with the CSO in December it made me realize how little I know about the composer himself. This documentary seems to go back and forth between musicians playing his music and the biographical info about him when he wrote each piece.

>>> Rotten Tomatoes has it at 92% <<<
item.how_to_find_us: meetup sign will visible inside the theatre before and after.
item.name: "In Search Of Beethoven" film at the Regent in Arlington
